title: Build homebrew bottles for multiple distros from a single job

content.raw:
Support was added for building homebrew bottles for multiple distros in pull request #341. In order to test this, I duplicated the bottle builder job and changed the label to el_capitan:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder_el_capitan

We have been building bottles for both yosemite and el_capitan, but I have to start the el_capitan jobs manually. It would be nice to create a single job that will trigger builds for all available distros. This is what upstream homebrew does with configurations:

* https://bot.brew.sh/job/Homebrew%20Core/14858/
